pages.vortex_one: Tool management page, has a login that distinguishes between roles, on the page you can delete, add, see the details or modify the tools.
pages.vortex_two: Can be accessed as a user or as an admin, the latter can create a new user, view those that are registered and delete them if you wish.
pages.vortex_three: In addition, the list can be ordered ascending or descending, by different fields (description, category, assigned user) or filtered by some word / letter.
pages.vortex_four: When creating a new user, the password is encrypted with jwt.
pages.full_one: Task management page where you can edit, delete or create a new task, it also has a login to log in.
pages.full_two: Can be accessed as a user or as an administrator, the latter can create a new user.
pages.full_three: The list can be sorted alphabetically or filtered from the search engine.
